alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 29 at 5:20PM CDT until September 29 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lyon County in southwestern Minnesota... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 520 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ghent, or 7 miles west of Marshall, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Marshall, Minneota, and Ghent around 525 PM CDT. Cottonwood around 530 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lynd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
